strings: <voice_0x010016CD><se_def>Angelo: Ah! It's been a while, <hero>. I came as soon as I heard the news. So it seems we'll have the honour of escorting the lovely Princess.

<voice_0x010016CE><se_def>Angelo: I just ran into Yangus, too.
Same as ever!
<voice_0x010016CF><se_def>Angelo: I'm a busy man, as you know. So I wasn't too thrilled at first at having to drop everything and come over. But it is good to see the old gang again.
<voice_0x010016D0><se_def>Angelo: Anyway, are you really all right with this wedding going ahead? You don't have to stick around if it's too hard for you.

<voice_0x010016D1><se_def>Angelo: Just do what you have to do, my friend.
Like I did when I left the abbey.

<voice_0x010016D2><se_high>*: Angelo's so wonderful!
You know, he looks after children who don't have anywhere else to go, don't you?<page>*: He says he wants to repay all the kindness Abbot Francisco showed him when he was all alone in the world. Isn't he just the sweetest man you ever met!?
<voice_0x010016D5><se_def>Angelo: Hey! No need to tell the whole world! I have a certain image to maintain with my...admirers.

<voice_0x010016D6><se_def>Angelo: Well then, see you in a bit, <hero>.
I'll be down in the courtyard taking a break.
Come and find me when you're ready.

<voice_0x010016D2><se_high>*: Angelo's so wonderful!
You know he looks after children who don't have anywhere else to go, don't you?
<voice_0x010016D3>*: He says he wants to repay all the kindness Abbot Francisco showed him when he was all alone in the world.
<voice_0x010016D4>*: Isn't he just the sweetest man you ever met!?
<voice_0x010016D5><se_def>Angelo: Hey! No need to tell the whole world! I have a certain image to maintain with my...admirers.
